sentence.Network_en: Staff are often discourteous and sometimes downright rude.
sentence.Network_cn: 职员常常态度很不礼貌，有时候极其蛮横。

sentence.Network_en: I was offended by his discourteous reply.
sentence.Network_cn: 他无礼的回答使我很生气.

sentence.Network_en: His behaviour was wanting in courtesy , ie discourteous, rude.

list.abs: Be courteous -- even when people are most discourteous to you ., 要有礼貌 ─ ─ 即使当别人对你最不礼貌的时候.

XVII . any discourteous behaviour a member of an official delegation can earn the disqualification of a competitor , the entire team , or delegation from the tournament .代表团的任何成员有无礼的行为，可导致选手、团队或代表团失格退出锦标赛。

definite reply 明确的答复discourteous reply 无礼的回答frank reply 率直的回答

entry.def: If you say that someone is discourteous, you mean that they are rude and have no consideration for the feelings of other people.

example.ex: Staff are often discourteous and sometimes downright rude.
example.tran: 职员常常态度很不礼貌，有时候极其蛮横。

sentences.sentence: "a distant and at times discourteous young"

auth_sentence.content: It is discourteous to force disagreeable thoughts on listeners who do not seek them.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is discourteous to force disagreeable thoughts on listeners who do not seek them.
